nodes.bodyText: We specifically want to wait for this commit to happen; apply will return immediately.

This Change gives me a warning in android studio
"Multi-catch with these reflection exceptions requires API level 19 (current min is 16) because they get compiled to the common but new super type ReflectiveOperationException. As a workaround either create individual catch statements, or catch Exception."
Currently we set the min as JellyBean not KitKat
Because it is covered in the default entry. But I will add it back if you think it makes it less readable.
I think it is fine to leave it out
